summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no information available about Kathryn Dyer. The documents primarily discuss the results of an ARRB meeting on November 17, 1997, focusing on the release of CIA records related to the JFK assassination. The topics covered include the Warrenton Records Center, CIA's use of State Cover, Nosenko NBR records, Cuban Revolutionary Council financial records, the Ramparts Damage Assessment Document, Book Cables Dissemination Lists, and Document #104-10072-10232. Kathryn Dyer is not mentioned in the summaries.
